website_summaries.verdict: A high-tech device that allows you and your baby to sleep easy.
pros: High marks from new moms who use this device to ensure their babies maintain healthy sleep
We love that there's nearly no radiation emitted from this device
Easily clips onto the waistband of your baby's diaper
cons: Make sure the device fits snugly on your baby's diapers or it may trigger false alarms

customer_reviews.title: Great for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: We just had a baby that was in the NICU for 43 days. We have both an owlet and the Sense U. Unfortunately the Owlet is still too big for our little preemie, so the Sense U has been a life saver! We are definitely happy we bought this product and it does well for us. My only complaint would be that it’s not rechargeable and it can only be synced to one device at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: PEACE AT LAST!!!
customer_reviews.text: PEACE of mind. Can't really put a price on it. Huge points for ease of use. It's super simple for exhausted moms to quietly move it from outfit to outfit. Just remember to take it off before washing. I actually slept knowing this gives me alerts. I SLEPT for the first time since coming home from the hospital!! I SLEPT!!!! Extra bonus for fast breathing, position, and temperature. I need to hug the person who made this...
customer_reviews.author: Jess S

customer_reviews.title: Test run went well!
customer_reviews.text: We are due in 4 weeks and I wanted to make sure I had the Sense-U up and running before the baby arrived. There was an easy set-up (under 10 minutes) and when "trying" it out on myself the phone app was very accurate in detecting movement, roll-overs and temperature. This is the peace-of-mind we were looking for with our first baby. Feeling positive about using this when the little one arrives.
customer_reviews.author: TAYLOR & KATIE

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Moto Z Play
customer_reviews.text: I had a little trouble figuring out how to connect it every night...turns out you just need Bluetooth and GPS on. No need to resync or double shake every night! I tested the not breathing function by removing it from my daughter's chest and sure enough, a loud alarm went off. I love that it shows you her temperature and what side she is laying on. Really gives a piece of mind for a new mom and dad.
customer_reviews.author: Phatsmackeyluv

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using this for a little under a week but I’m sooooo happy with it! I was worried I wouldn’t be able to sleep at all with my newborn preemie but this give me the peace of mind to rest! I’ve tested to make sure it works by setting it off to the side while on and it gives a loud alert for breathing if it doesn’t detect any motion. It also does a gentler alert for being on belly. I haven’t tried much with temperature. Def make sure the baby is wearing snug clothes or swaddled tightly to prevent false alarms but I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: ErinBrooke

customer_reviews.title: Puts my mind at rest
customer_reviews.text: Although a little pricey, this device puts my mind at ease. I can go to sleep at night not having to check on my newborn to see if she was breathing. I can check the app and see without worries. It also alerts me when she gets on her stomach (she likes to sleep on her side a lot) which makes me not having to worry about SIDS. The battery lasts for about 3 weeks before having to be replaced, but we also have the app running all the time on an old i phone we had.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The latest version (Mar 2019) is a big improvement
customer_reviews.text: The original model had several issues, but we are much more pleased after trying an updated version. It is working well, not sending false alarms, and stays connected to the mobile app better.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product really it's great and helped ease my anxiety of having a newborn. It is easy to apply the button and use the app. It is great to not spend a lot but get a lot out of it. Highly recommend. I only wish you could have 2 people to each button on the app. Also, a way to remember the bluetooth once connected that way do not have to pair them again when log out of the app. Still overall amazing
customer_reviews.author: A. Lenz

customer_reviews.title: The best baby breathing & movement monitor so far. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Sense-U! We bought this monitor after our baby just came back from hospital. It works great! It monitors not only my baby's respiration rate, and also his sleeping position, together with temperature and humidity. I do not think I slept for the first couple of weeks after my son was born. I slept much better now knowing I will be notified if anything happens to my son. The app works throughout the house without a problem. The price is right and as an investment in peace of mind and safety for your baby, it worth the money! I recommend for all new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H

customer_reviews.title: Confidence to sleep!
customer_reviews.text: My baby stops breathing in her sleep for 10ish seconds at a time. This has given me the confidence to sleep and know my baby will be ok! It is also good as she sleeps hot in her swaddle. This helps me make sure she is not over heated!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bribery
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Unhappy with the product. Initially alarm was going off on my phone. Now alarm does not go off. Also just received an email from company stating they would send me a free swaddle if i left i positive review. Clearly these “positive” reviews fooled me into buying it
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M

customer_reviews.title: Won’t come on
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this, my 3 month old will only sleep on his tummy which scares me so I basically stay up all night making sure he’s breathing, finally bought this so I could get some sleep, and it got here today and it won’t work, there’s a light that supposed to come on when you’re pairing with your phone and it just never comes on. We changed the battery and again nothing happened, We emailed them this morning and they still haven’t replied us, we will be returning this and we’re very frustrated with the whole experience
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: very useful!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a new mother a little paranoid with my new baby he's so small but very strong he already rips through my sad attempts of swaddling and would try to flip over the alarm will sound and I can flip him back over quickly. Very good device for paranoid new mothers. I do however recommend you use a snug onesie or else it doesn't pick up your babies breathing very well.
customer_reviews.author: Keet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This came setup and ready. I just downloaded the app and it was ready to use immediately. It also came with a second battery which will be useful eventually. The battery is lasting a while already. My only complaint is that if my phone is on vibrate I don't hear the alerts and I haven't been able to get the alerts to sound without my phone sound being on.
customer_reviews.author: SarahC.

customer_reviews.title: I truly love it.
customer_reviews.text: This has come in handy. When I first got it I realized that the alarm feature was a quiet chirping sound, but I was able to go into the app on my phone and customize the alarm for it. It is a truly great device especially if your babies have GERD.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb W.

customer_reviews.title: So many false alarms
customer_reviews.text: So many “weak breathing detected” all night. Can make you go crazy thinking oh it’s just another false alarm but what if it isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bernal

customer_reviews.title: No issues. Just not as easy as we thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have a problem with this is just more of a headache I think then we thought it was gonna be
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Baldridge

customer_reviews.title: It is such a relief to know baby is ok!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as the baby was sleep-training us. I wanted to know how he was doing without bothering him! At first, we set the temperature minimum too high, and we got alerts all the time, so lower that body temperature minimum to not get as many. When I take it off and forget to turn off the app, it goes off within seconds, so I know it will work when we need it to! Thank you for some piece of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I loved the product, my baby was having some bad reflux issues and had some episodes where she would have a hard time breathing from it. This gave me piece of mind and was very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for new moms
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use affordable device that helps a new mom to feel safe. It’s like a guardian angel looking over the newborn!
customer_reviews.author: Melody A. Burton

customer_reviews.title: All Around Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Shake twice to pair does not work reliably (more like shake 50 times if you're lucky). Movement tracking does not work reliably (keeps reporting baby on side). Breathing not displaying (just shows ---). Range not what reported (30', no firewall, no signal). Returning immediately, do not want a replacement. With a product like this, manufacturers HAVE to get it right the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Garri

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay connected
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted this product to work. Worked really well for about 5-10 minutes. Then off. The phone we were using was about 15 feet from the baby. Walked back in. Reconnected. Got another 5 minutes. Had to hit the on/off button each time to get breath monitoring back on. No point in having it if it can’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Smellypirate

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! I was so stressed because my daughter was born with spina bifida and had to be only on her belly for her first month and had 5 surgeries in her first month and a half and driving to the doc was a 2 hour drive and my husband couldn’t always take off work so to be alone and not be able to check make sure she was breathing was scary! Thank you Sense-U for giving me a peace of mind in car rides and bedtime so I can actually sleep andnit jumping up to check her every 2 minuets. Works great connect easy for a tech challenged person!!
customer_reviews.author: Kami Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update::: I tried the 2019 version and the 2019 version works much better!! The clothing has to be really tight. I am sure it's a great product, just didn't work for us. I have a 2.5 month old who wears 3-6 months clothes which are just a bit big on him but he is long so doesn't fit into 0-3 size so the clothes are a little loose which doesn't give you accurate reading with this product. It was also having trouble connecting to wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Girshik

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT USE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 units for my twins. One of them didn’t work, and the second is working but show false alarms and wrong body temperature... not recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sahar Kahlon

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, can be worn all the time when I go to family house I don't need to lug around this big item
customer_reviews.author: Joel Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I would like to put -100 but I just don’t have this option! I really wanna return this thing as I can’t throw away $100. This this IS NOT WORKING!! It woke me up few time showing that my baby don’t breath, and it woke up up my I breathable baby!!!! And when my son really turned on his tommy this thing didnt alert me!!! Thank god I heard my baby and woke up!! I’m so upset to spend so much money for that “bul”””et”
customer_reviews.author: Alena Triznova

customer_reviews.title: I can FINALLY sleep at night!
customer_reviews.text: This product has given me such piece of mind at night! Being a first time mom yo worry all the time and now I can close my eyes at night knowing that if something were to happen this device will alert me! They also send an extra battery! Syncing the device to my phone was a breeze and the instructions are easy to follow! If you're thinking about getting a monitor and don't want to spend $250+ this device is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Steelman

customer_reviews.title: Like/liked - could be better
customer_reviews.text: I waited for a few weeks before I did my review.. I had my eyes set on the Owlet, but didn't have the money for it. I came across this and read the reviews, it didn't seem bad, reviews were good.. So I ordered it.. this could be a great product, but it constantly stops working. I am forever having to forcestop the app. That doesn't help a mom with a new baby have even the slightest piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Bree G.

customer_reviews.title: way better than owlett
customer_reviews.text: sensor is easy to pair with ios app, app for android wouldnt open on any device i tried when installing from the app store. I was able to download the apk file and side load the app and now have no issues. overall really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! No more touching baby to check temperature. I was waking him up like half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works great... we have been happy with our purchase and have only had 1 false alarm in 2 weeks. The product works as advertised and gives us peace of mind knowing it is monitoring our baby while we sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple false/incorrect alerts
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this was given a design reward. The two features we purchased the SenseU for do not work. The stomach rollover alert constantly alarmed when he was on his back. Even after 15 min it could not properly obtain our baby's temperature and was showing a low temperature (68F) when a regular thermometer gave readings of 98-99F. The instructions are also poorly written. It describes how to remove the battery for replacement but not how to re-assemble after replacing the battery. This like a typical low quality Chinese product. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ko

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this baby monitor for my newborn daughter just before deployment with the Army for a year. The comfort it gives me is very much needed. I have peace of mind knowing that this quality product can be relied on.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bolinger

customer_reviews.title: Great idea... but didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Update: they sent me a new updated version and it does work better than the previous one. My daughter is sleeping all kinds of weird so for the last could of days I’ve had it on her to just make sure she was breathing without having to check on her by opening the door. It doesn’t have night vision or picture... it comes with a spare battery.., however. Only one phone hooked at a time... and my newborn seemed agitated by it, and her temperature was never correct.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mosi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Get the alert right to your phone! Clips onto babies clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device to make you sleep without fear
customer_reviews.text: Works as described.Our baby is very little and device works great.We know that she is breathing.Since our baby is preterm and little her clothes are a bit to big.Sense-u few times changed its position and wasn’t touch baby and alarm went off.Thanks to that we know that it is working and can sleep without fear that we will not notice something is wrong with the baby.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and keeps me at ease. Good price and easy to place on the clothes or blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy the SenseU! I didn’t want to spend the money on an owlet, but wanted something that gave me piece of mind. My newborn decided to start rolling over at 1 month old and it made me nervous. The sense-U gives me a good alert to let me know when she flips. I feel a lot better going to sleep knowing the sound will go off. The only thing I’ve found a problem with is the battery is already at 60% and I’ve only used it 4 times.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice device issue with app on occasion
customer_reviews.text: The item would get 5 stars from me if the app didnt have occasional issues with disconnecting and reconnecting. I'm a first time mom and the stress of everything that can go wrong when my loved one is sleeping was keeping me up all night. It made for an extremely exhausted mom. Once I'm sure the device will stay connected it gives me peace of mind that it will go off if my loved one is having any issues. This is also financially more realistic then the owlet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak signal
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it only works if your right next to your baby. The alert sound isnt very alerting cant change the tone or volume of it. Honestly very displeased and returning i didnt use it but the weak signal is very annoying and its pointless if i cant check on my baby when im not right to her.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of my high anxiety with my daughters breathing. It is amazing. So easy to connect to my phone, clear instructions, and alerts me when something is wrong or she has rolled onto her tummy. She doesnt even notice it is there. I love how fast it updates information based on what she is doing, it seems like seconds after she rolls it is alerting me. Update. I accidentally washed my sensor and was so upset. I let it dry out amd changed the battery and the thing still worked!!!!! Definitely will buy it again for kids in the future.
customer_reviews.author: hailey craig

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This thing does not work. I tested it out before baby got here by putting it on my shirt & it picked up my breathing...then I took it off and set it on the counter and it still had various breaths per minute registering. I decided to keep it to see what happened when baby was here & it never stays connected. I can have my phone in my pocket and be sitting right next to her and it won’t connect. Now it’s too late for me to refund & I’m stuck with a sensor that doesn’t do anything right.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: As a new mom, I was super worried about my baby sleeping unsupervised. I love that this device is small, easy to use, and syncs easily to my phone. The alarm is loud when it goes off because of weak breathing (which I thankfully have only heard after taking it off in the morning without first turning it off on the app). I have an iPhone11 and haven't had any issues with the syncing, and it works throughout my whole house without disconnecting. Definitely recommend for peace of mind and much better than more expensive options!!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Poirot

customer_reviews.title: Mostly accurate
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to use, but the temperature is not accurate as it doesn’t actually touch the baby’s belly. The position of the baby is pretty accurate, unless her diaper is on her belly then it shows her to be sitting up. Over all it’s definitely worth the piece of mind. The breathing rate is also pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett Delle

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects every night
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and use but after giving it about a month, reading the manual repeatedly, and making sure all my phone settings were correct...it still unpairs every night. This is concerning as my 5 month old moves a lot and I would like to know when he has rolled to his stomach as well as any other breathing concerns but if it is not paired, no alarms. Also, within the last few days it has been reading that he is sitting up, when I can clearly see he is not. I wanted to really like this product but it has been disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Sense-U!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Sense-U! Provides excellent peace of mind, allowing me to really sleep for those 2-3 hour stretches. Easy to attach to a tight swaddle or onesie. We haven’t had any problem with connecting/disconnecting or false alarms. Easy to download the app and activate/deactivate during middle of the night changes. An affordable alternative to the owlet. We bought two and gave one to a friend. Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: David Gaytan

customer_reviews.title: Bad connection
customer_reviews.text: I kept the app open all night, would wake up to check on my baby and it wouldve lost connection. Would have to wiggle phone/move around to get it to connect again. Our rooms are right next to each other with her crib being on the other side of the separating wall. Definitely is still in the wifi distance. Luckily I just got to help ease myself into the crib transition, when she started rolling into her stomach. Tried to get it to work for 2 weeks.. then decided it wasn't giving me the quick glance when I woke like I wanted and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I seriously couldn’t imagine not having this with my newborn. As a mom who lost a child this helps me get through the sleepless nights. Plus it is super easy and convenient to use!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbie McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Let’s  me have a peaceful sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Best product on market! Good quality product! I have a peace of mind knowing my baby is breathing, on back, and within a good temperature. If anything changes during the night my alarm alerts me to wake up and check on baby. It came in handy after my baby had shots given. Temperature spiked to 101. Thanks to the censer, it alerted me immediately, and I was able to handle the situation. Very grateful for this product, life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Gambini

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 flaw that I have noticed
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for 3 days now. The only thing I dont like about it is that I cant have the sound notification on. Any time the breathing number changes it dings. And the number never stays the same so my phone constantly goes off. So really it kinda defeats the purpose of me buying this.. but I like that I can wake up and see that baby is still breathing.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Finally, some sleep!
customer_reviews.text: my wife and I just had our second child and were trying to figure out how we can sleep a bit more soundly at night - I did a quick search for baby wearables and found this device. It’s accurate and quick, although nothing dangerous has happened to our little girl yet, it can quickly determine if her breathing has changed, if her temp is off, or if she’s rolled over. Let’s be honest, the likelihood of something bad happening to her is slim, but just being able to rest easy has been worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jayi8

customer_reviews.title: Great product, limited app use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, only down side is you can’t have multiple people logged into to app, I’d love to be able to have myself and my husband to be able to monitor the results at the same time, other then that I love it and it gives us great peace of mind. Make sure your volume on your phone is tuned up so you can hear the notifications. I love this thing
customer_reviews.author: EvilBarbie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed. Very inconsistent on audible alerts/alarms - sometimes it will sound an alarm and vibrate, other times it will just vibrate (which may not be enough of a warning for us tired parents). Also has connectivity issues - not so much for my Android, but definitely a pain in the ass (and sometimes not possible) for my wife's iphone. Have it currently lying on the night stand - which is currently breathing at 23 breathes/min? Not quite sure how this has a 4 rating.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: With the amount of money it costs, it keeps disconnecting. I have to keep pairing it to my phone again. Plus it doesn't work if you are even in a different room from the baby. I got this to have a peace of mind when I'm not around the baby or at work. But it's no use. Decided to give this product another try after the seller explained to me that some barriers interfere with the signal. It is pretty accurate in the position of the baby and respiration too.
customer_reviews.author: Fatoumata

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity and temperature issues
customer_reviews.text: Device keeps disconnecting once I lock the phone, I have to reconnect manually Everytime I open the app. so if I am not getting any notifications, what is the purpose of this device. Also the temperature reported is not accurate, around 87F, and I am sure the baby's temperature is not that low. I don't recommend it, it doesn't give us the peace of mind we were hoping to get from this device, it doesn't work as described
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind every night.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and we're so glad to have purchased it. Been using it for our newborn 4 months now. It has been extremely useful and piece of mind, especially when our baby was sick with congestion. It gave off a few false triggers that got both my wife and I jumping out of our beds. I'm curious to see how this product performs when our baby starts to roll. Highly recommended to anyone with a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Nhat N.

customer_reviews.title: Turns off randomly
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product when we bought it, but now my daughter is 3 weeks old, and we've had to replace the battery twice already. It also randomly turns off and disconnects. This is very disappointing, as this product is made to be used at night while you're sleeping. I have not been able to get restful sleep knowing that it could turn off and not alert me if she stops breathing, which is why I bought this in the first place. I would buy something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Mooey

customer_reviews.title: The device randomly disconnects
customer_reviews.text: The Sense-u was very easy to set up and works great when it is connected. However, despite leaving the app running in the foreground, it randomly disconnects. I have awakened multiple times to find it disconnected. This renders the device essentially useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Spivey-Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Helped keep my son safe during a roll over
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but I love this product. It gives me great peace of mind. It's easy to use and pretty durable (it once accidentally went through the wash and still works, but I don't recommend that, haha). Just the other night, my son flipped himself over onto his stomach & the breathing alert went off (I didn't have the roll over alarm activated). I credit this product for my son's safety that night! My one complaint is that the battery does tend to run out rather quickly, but I just keep a bunch of back ups on hand.
customer_reviews.author: wanderingkat

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: This device works pretty much as advertised. My main complaints would be that you can only pair the deice to one phone at a time, and you have to manually turn on the alert volume to hear the warning sounds. It would be nice if you could connect to multiple phones, and have some sort of sound/vibrate override for phones in silent mode, but probably not an issue for most users.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin O

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while on sale to use for my son who was due July 6th but arrived 6 weeks early. It worked for 2 days before failing to properly synch up with my Samsung 9. My husband and I tried many times but it will not operate as promised which is disheartening, especially having a premie. I was hoping for some reliable peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Cammi

customer_reviews.title: Need better instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: I do have a little more peace of mind to sleep at night b/c the position sensor definitely works and the breathing monitor APPEARS to work correctly and both will alarm when needed. I still do not understand how and why it tracks temp and humidity. Those two are never the same as my other room thermometer. Humidity on U-Sense actually always says 0%. Product needs a better manual to explain all the functions and settings.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Give me peace of mind while baby sleeps. Even though I have a monitor and an under the mattress sensor for breathing, Sense-U covers the roll-over portion that I wasn't able to monitor actively. Now that baby is starting to roll over, I can know exactly what position he's sleeping in and also get alerts if he's on his belly. Ahh! peace of mind... LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for New Parents
customer_reviews.text: Great product, right out of the box there is a battery in the device and an extra one with an extra clip. Looks great it’s light enough to carry any wear. The device is accurate you could test it out with your hand by flipping in different positions. The alerts are pretty straight forward and will react with out a doubt making new parents have a bit more comfort when there newborn is sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product that Bings me Peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Got this before my baby was born. My baby was born 6 weeks early and was in the NICU for over 3 weeks. This product combined with the owlet sock has brought me peace of mind that my baby is okay. I was worried I wouldn’t sleep after I got him home. Great product and easy to use. Only thing I am confused about is the temperature option and what it is used for. I thought it monitored the baby’s temperature. But I would suggest this as an alternative for those on a budget who can not afford the more expensive options like the sock.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning this. Got it for peace of mind to help me rest. This is 3rd baby and I always get PPD and severe anxiety. One of the things that causes me the anxiety is babies breathing. After using this for a few days I realized there’s no way it was going to work for us. My phone kept overheating anytime I used the app. (iPhone XR)
customer_reviews.author: Janel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. My son recently was hospitalized for RSV and this has eased our worries of his respirations since we’ve been home. It’s super simple to use. The only things I would change is how the manual reads and the fact that if you’re further than 50ft, the app disconnects. I had to do some digging to figure out what to set the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Sharleen Carsley

customer_reviews.title: Poor signal
customer_reviews.text: Can't really give much of a review other than to say it doesn't work. The range of this is nowhere near 50 feet. I can only pick up the signal if I'm near his room, which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I’m uncertain about battery life because we have only had it a few days but it’s still going strong. I live that I can lay down and sleep and not worry so much about my child. Has given our household much needed relief. I debated about getting an owlet but I needed something with rollover detection. This met All our needs for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Must have for New babies
customer_reviews.text: This is a literal life saver. We bought this to replace an owlet that got chewed up by a dog. The price and reviews attracted us to this product and we are glad we bought it. It's easy to setup and use, and within a week of using it, it alarmed us in the middle of the night that our child stopped breathing. We are so thankful we bought this and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t connect & broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get some peace of mind when my baby sleeps and I couldn’t get it to connect at all, then I realized that the metal piece was broken. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, works really well, wish it breastfed too 😂
customer_reviews.text: Like: small, easy to clip, receptive Bluetooth connectivity automatic whenever within distance (within approximately 15 feet). Dislikes: price - but what’re you gonna do. Wish it was like $50. But for the functionality, totally worth it. Provides little bit more peace of mind - really like the clean easy to use app.
customer_reviews.author: SSB

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtful design
customer_reviews.text: It's synced up with my spare phone. You'll want to keep the phone close to the device. It will give you alerts if temperature it breathing drop. You can adjust the thresholds for how sensitive you want it to be. I'm using an Android phone and I had to make some adjustments to keep my phone awake with the app
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life savor. My child started to roll over before 1 month and needed something to monitor him and this does an amazing job. He wears it every night and the battery will last about a month. The sirens that goes off to tell me that something is happening gets my attention and are very loud
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Okulski

customer_reviews.title: Faulty breathing
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until a week later. When i remove the sensor and place on my dresser, the alarm fails to go off and is still picking up breathing patterns. Lost my peace of mind with this product
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Lee

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: This app gives me a peace of mind. When I moved my son to his crib from the bassinet I was worried that something would happen and I wouldn't know about it. I love that this has an app that you put on your phone and that it will alert you of breathing, temperature and rolling to his stomach. I also like the fact that it will let you choose which things that you would like to be alerted to, for instance I dont have to be alerted when my son rolls over unless I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Quits.
customer_reviews.text: Works until it quits and you’re forced to stare at your baby all night instead. No, I’m not going to go into my baby’s room, wake them up, take the device off, and shake it to repair to my phone that is been paired to for months. Save your money and your frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Idkmybffjill

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: great idea but that’s about it. Constantly disconnects. sends false alarms about temperature dropping. I decided to test how soon after no breathing will it send an alarm. I took it off my baby placed it on the table...it sent me an alarm 30 min after no breathing....My baby would be dead by then. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dina onishchenko

customer_reviews.title: Able to sleep now but connection issues
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old decides to roll over onto her tummy and sleep like that which scares me because I can't see her face I can't tell if she's able to breathe without constantly going to check but with the sense u monitor I have been able to sleep knowing it tracks her breathing and will alarm if breathing is too fast or to slow . The only downfall is the connection it's 50ft but in an open space so it tends to not connect unless I'm next to the wall her bed is at which is fine since I'm sleeping in the room next to her bedroom . Other than that I'm still happy about purchasing it
customer_reviews.author: Mariela apreza

customer_reviews.title: Great product that I recommend to infant mamas!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! My child will only sleep in the rock and play and since it’s been recalled I use this monitor to make sure she’s not rolling over or at a bad breathing position. We’ve set off the alarm a few times and IT WORKS! Much cheaper than the owlet sock and provides the same information
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay C

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off randomly
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about recieving this product. I loked the fact that it detected breathing, temp and roll over. But what's the point in it if it keeps shutting off randomly. That does me no good when I'm sleeping and have no idea. Also I have it set for the alarms to go off in 15 seconds. Sometimes they do sometimes they don't. I've been playing with it to test it out. Just frustrated becuase I really wanted this to work. I think I'm going to return and try something different.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to use it on my baby yet since she's not due until August, but I put it on me and it works like it said it would. My only problem is that there is no on/off switch on the device itself so when it's off on the phone and the device gets shaken it lights up trying to connect. It worries me because of the battery being drained.
customer_reviews.author: Yas

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!! Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: As a new parent definitely very paranoid when it’s bed time but this gave me peace at mind a few false alarms here and there but still don’t regret buying I rather wake up for nothing than to be sleeping while something happens , I did a lot of research before buying and I would say this is the best on the market super safe doesn’t cause any burns like other products I read about simply clip it on to baby’s clothing and super light weight, long battery life and you can bring it with you anywhere at any time and not to mention super affordable compared to other products
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the most part
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. The monitor sends an alert when baby rolls to his stomach, which is very useful but it also alerts you when your baby breathing is weak. The monitor has gone off a couple times for weak breathing, giving me a heart attack. Each time it has gone off I would jump up to check on baby and baby was perfectly fine. Other than the weak breathing alert it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Grover

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to set up the app! Happy with everything so far!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Great device helps us sleep at night
customer_reviews.text: This device helps us sleep better at night. Our baby was a preemie and we were nervous. App is great. Only problem is device doesn’t connect to phone from too far of a distance. We walk to another room and it disconnects. Also battery on device runs out quickly, I suggest buying additional batteries with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Happy Parents with Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of monitors out there for different things relating to newborn/baby health. I did my reviews on the Sense-U and felt comfortable with it as opposed to other ones, such as the OwletCare baby monitor which we read heated/burned the foot. We tried the Sense-U on a newborn after the stump fell and we are hooked on it! Gives us a bigger peace of mind. And it was easy to set up. The only problem is that only 1 device can be connected to the Sense-U. Hopefully future improvements/firmware can allow for multiple users to connect to the Sense-U, so that both parents or caretakers can monitor. We would definitely recommend this to others!
customer_reviews.author: N. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth signal must be strong
customer_reviews.text: What a great little button! My son is 8 weeks and I am soooo paranoid when I put him down. This allows me to relax and actually get some much needed sleep. The battery does drain a little fast, but it’s easy and cheap to replace so it’s not a problem. Overall, $99 is worth the piece of mind it brings. #firsttimemom
customer_reviews.author: Haley Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Never worked properly....
customer_reviews.text: Being a first time Mom, I purchased this item hoping to ease my anxiety while my newborn was sleeping. Unfortunately this did just the opposite. The alarms were constantly going off for no reason at all. The monitor would constantly alert me of no/low breathing while my baby was fully awake and active. Or tell me the baby was on her stomach when she wasn’t.. so after trying to correct the positioning, watching the “how to” videos, adjusting the alarm notifications, etc, I just ended up purchasing another product instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi H.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Great in theory but just didn't work right. Put my son in his snuggest PJs and clipped this on, then used a tight swaddle around him on top of it and it still wouldn't sense his breathing. Panicked a few times and went to check on him to find he was just fine. Ended up turning the breathing sensor alerts off, which defeats the whole purpose of this. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Before buying this, I was up multiple times a night just laying my hand on my little mans belly to make sure he was breathing....I was afraid to sleep! Since using Sense-U I am finally able to get a good nights sleep knowing I will be alerted if he stops breathing. I was debating on buying this product or spending the extra money on an owlet because that’s what everyone talks about! I’m soooo happy I didn’t. Sense-U does exactly what I need it to do at a much affordable price. Thank you so much for giving me ease of mind everyday :)
customer_reviews.author: RFG1022

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Always disconnected and never actually functional! What's the point if it doesn't actually monitor my baby like its supposed to. It will sometimes have the temperature but not the breathing. Worthless!
customer_reviews.author: skeley

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great until now, I have it for a week and I wanted to have something that tells me if anything was wrong with my baby's breathing, especially at night when we can't check on him all the time, more if he stopped breathing than fast breathing, but it does both so its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Camille De Armas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I am so paranoid about SIDS and being able to see his breathing on my phone without standing over him and knowing it will alarm me helps me actually get some sleep at night. He is also still swaddled and learning to roll at night so that alarm eases me as well. Thank you Sense-U
customer_reviews.author: Addyson Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Sense-U baby monitor gave me such peace of mind! My husband works 3rd shift, so it’s great knowing that I have something else monitoring my LO. I also love that it takes both body and ambient temperature. (My LO tends to get very hot when dressed; so I was always worried he would overheat while swaddled and sleeping at night). The only thing that took some getting used to was turning the alerts off when doing night time diaper changes. That loud (but necessary) alarm will sure make your heart skip a beat at 4am, while only half awake! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: Uses about one battery a month. Will disconnect and reconnect frequently when I am in another room which is a little worrisome. I will be looking for something else once baby isn’t bedside and in his own room. I have to turn off temperature alarms when nursing at night or it wakes him.
customer_reviews.author: ashleyannPT

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy we decided to make this purchase. It has provided my husband and myself with the peace of mind to finally get some sleep knowing that our newborn is protected. We tested out the alarm if he stops breathing and it will wake all of us. I am happy with our purchase and would happily recommend to anyone with a new baby at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps to give me peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this monitor. It is easy to use and it seems to be accurate so far. It can determine what side they are sleeping on, their temperature and their breathing rates. It is very easy and convenient to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to measure to the skin temperature of my fiancee who, had a pain in her side and the forehead thermometer was reading 103 deg F. But She, and her doctors, claimed that the forehead temperature is different than a side temperature, so I had to purchase this skin temperature sensing thermometer to show that there's an issue. The unit synced up the the phone, within a minute and was transmitting temperatures. You can adjust the alert and notification settings as you see fit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

product_meta.title: (2020 New Model) Sense-U Baby Monitor with Breathing Rollover Movement Body Temperature Sensors: Track Your Baby's Breathing, Rollover, Body Temperature with New Clasp Design (Body Temperature)
feature_bullets: KNOW YOUR BABY'S BREATHING IS OKAY: Integrated with high-performance sensor chipset, the 2020 new model of the Sense-U baby monitor accurately monitors your baby's breathing while they sleep, and notifies you with audible alarm for no breathing movement from your smartphone.
MEASURE BODY TEMPERATURE FOR OVERHEATING & COLD ALERTS: Monitor your baby's body temperature with built-in thermometer, and notify you when outside of preset zones.
NOTIFY YOU FOR STOMACH SLEEPING: Monitor your baby's sleeping position and notify you when your baby rolls over onto their stomach.

BLUETOOTH LOW ENERGY TECHNOLOGY&30-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE:The Sense-U Baby Monitor uses Bluetooth Low Energy(BT4.0) which has almost zero radiation level and a communication distance up to 50 feet(15m). Please note firewalls will affect the communication distance. Love it or return within 30 days for a full refund, making it a great gift for baby registries and showers or as a gift to new parents.

WEARING INSTRUCTION: The device needs to clip on Snug Fit diaper(pants/shorts/etc) around the baby’s belly button to get accurate health readings, or else it may introduce false breathing & position feedback.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars721 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
